Package backend

Version 1.4
Modified at 0624.
Coomments: add MealManagerSingle.java to implement design pattern-Singleton

This is the backend package helping you read and write our database.

How to install?
Directly put the BOTH backend directory and org directory under the ../PROJECTNAME/src .

How to import?
Add "import backend.*" at the top of your code, and then you can use those classes.

How to use?
Each class represent the each json files provided by TA according to the class name and json file name.
And those json files are put under the ../backend/file .

Warning: The directory, ../backend/file , is our database, so if you overwrite any file. The package might go wrong.
For the security of purpose, except for TicketManager and Ticket which can write or create a json file, the other classes can ONLY read the file.
This is to say, we only provide getter method for them (the other classes).

Version 1.2.0
Modified at 0612.
Coomments: add seat directory, and we can operate each XXXX-XXXX-seat.json respectively.
By doing this, you need to input trainNo, and StationId as parameter to constructor.

Coomments: There is a change in Ticket Class. I change the way to get "ticketsCount" into "ticketsCountA" and "ticketsCountB" in booking.json

kobemary
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Crawler  
    EarlyDiscount
    This is the class to handle earlyDiscount.json
    MealManager
    Please Don't use this class and turn to MealManagerSingle.java
    MealManagerSingle
    You can imagine this class as real person help you to make order in real life.
    Order
    This is a class to operate every order of meal.
    Price
    This is the class used to operate price.json
    Seat
    This is the class used to handle seat.json
    SeatTest
    DO NOT USE THIS CLASS.
    Singleton  
    Station
    This is the class used to handle station.json
    Ticket
    一張票就是一張Ticket object 你可以由getter setter得到ticket的任何資訊 要注意的是，仔細看原始json檔用的value是什麼type，若要用setter，應當要傳入正確的型態 若賣出一張ticket，就要new出一個Ticket object，並用setter對所有欄位做設定， 不然新new的Ticket object所有欄位會用預設值帶入
    TicketManager
    This class you will use to get the ArrayList of all tickets 你可以想想這是一個array，裡面放的是一張張Ticket 通常拿到Ticket後就是對Ticket class的操作了 別忘了若有更改ArrayList of all ticket，要call save()，才會把更新內容存入資料庫
    TimeTable
    This is the class used to handle timeTable.json
    UniversityDiscount
    This is the class used to operate universityDiscount.json
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadArguments
    This is exception Class that will be triggered when you use getter with unexpected argument.
    There for the getter cannot find the correct value in json file.
    SoldBuySeatException
